issue.title: [Java][Plasma] Improve Java Plasma client off-heap memory usage
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8168](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8168). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, Plasma Java client API use byte[], which need copy memory from Java on-heap to off-heap(mmap file). we can improve create() and get() method and return a ByteBuffer or DirectByteBuffer to avoid unnecessary memory copy.
